data.eml:eml: A new species of Haplothrips from southern Iran (Thysanoptera, Phlaeothripidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Minaei, Kambiz, Aleosfoor, Maryam (2013): A new species of Haplothrips from southern Iran (Thysanoptera, Phlaeothripidae). ZooKeys 275: 91-99, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.275.4433, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.275.4433
